name: Into the pit (version with ongoing improvments)
name_original: Into the pit (version with ongoing improvments)
description:
x  to shoot

arrow keys to move

c to dash

z to enter tank

a to exit tank

s to change weapons

works with a xbox controler

pressing + or - will change the window size

get 3000 moneys to win

also you cant exit the first room in the tank

eventually is now!

BORK BORK
